shop.title: Shop Dashboard
shop.page_description: Manage your repair shop settings, availability, pricing, and job offers.
shop.no_profile_description: Set up your shop information to start receiving job offers
shop.no_profile_message: Complete the setup below to activate your shop profile and start managing jobs.
shop.error_no_profile: No shop profile found. Please contact support.

offers.title: Active Job Offers
offers.description: New repair requests requiring your response
offers.no_offers: No active job offers at the moment.
offers.no_offers_hint: New jobs will appear here when they match your capabilities.
offers.response_error: Failed to respond to job offer

active_jobs.title: Active Jobs
active_jobs.no_jobs_hint: Accept job offers to start tracking their progress here.

profile_setup.title: Complete your shop profile to access the dashboard
profile_setup.complete_profile: Please complete your shop profile to continue.
profile_setup.check_email: Please check your email and click the verification link to complete signup.
profile_setup.error_create: Failed to create shop profile. Please try again.
profile_setup.error_already_exists: An account with this email already exists. Please use the Sign In tab instead.

insurer.title: Insurer Dashboard
insurer.network_description: Manage your preferred shop network for
insurer.profile_not_found_description: Your insurer profile is not set up. Please contact support to get started.
insurer.error_no_profile_hint: Please contact support to set up your insurer profile.
insurer.error_load_data: Failed to load insurer dashboard data

preferred_shops.title: Preferred Shop Network
preferred_shops.description: Manage your network of preferred repair shops. Jobs will be routed to these shops first.
preferred_shops.add_dialog_description: Select a shop to add to your preferred network
preferred_shops.no_shops_hint: Add shops to your network to ensure jobs are routed to them first
preferred_shops.shop_added_description: Preferred shop has been added successfully

profile_setup.title: Complete your insurer profile to access the dashboard
profile_setup.account_created_description: Your insurer account has been created successfully.
profile_setup.check_email: Please check your email and click the verification link to complete signup.
profile_setup.error_create: Failed to create insurer profile. Please try again.
profile_setup.error_already_exists: An account with this email already exists. Please use the Sign In tab instead.
